addFund(address,uint256).details: Adds funds to the treasury. Only whitelisted accounts can add whitelisted tokens.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to add.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to add.

addWhitelistedFunder(address).details: Adds an account to the whitelisted funders. Only the owner can call this function.

params._funderAddress: The address of the funder to whitelist.

addWhitelistedToken(address).details: Adds a token to the whitelist. Only the owner can call this function.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to whitelist.

getWhitelistedFunderAtIndex(uint256).details: Returns the address of a whitelisted funder at a given index.

params._index: The index of the funder to retrieve.

getWhitelistedFunderCount().details: Returns the number of whitelisted funders.

getWhitelistedTokenAtIndex(uint256).details: Returns the address of a whitelisted token at a given index.

params._index: The index of the token to retrieve.

getWhitelistedTokenCount().details: Returns the number of whitelisted tokens.

isWhitelistedFunder(address).details: Returns whether an account is a whitelisted funder.

params._funderAddress: The address of the funder to check.

returns._0: True if the account is whitelisted, false otherwise.

isWhitelistedToken(address).details: Returns whether a token is whitelisted.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to check.

returns._0: True if the token is whitelisted, false otherwise.

removeWhitelistedFunder(address).details: Removes an account from the whitelisted funders. Only the owner can call this function.

params._funderAddress: The address of the funder to remove.

removeWhitelistedToken(address).details: Removes a token from the whitelist. Only the owner can call this function.

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to remove.

sendFund(address,address,uint256).details: Sends funds from the treasury. Only the DAO contract can call this function.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send.
params._to: The address to send the tokens to.
params._tokenAddress: The address of the token to send.

updateDaoContractAddress(address).details: Updates the DAO contract address. Only the owner can call this function.

params._newDaoContractAddress: The new address of the DAO contract.
